articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Vice-PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of Laos, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 On hand were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					The standing vice-prime minister said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by Comrade Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung are growing stronger under the deep care of Comrade Choummaly Saynasone and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He referred to the fact that during their visit they saw the Korean people, firmly united around Kim Jong Il, dynamically waging the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Gift from Lao Government Official
articles.content:
Gift from Lao Government Official
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of Laos, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The standing vice-prime minister conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday.

articles.title: Chinese Special Envoy Winds up Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Special Envoy Winds up Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, special envoy for the Korean Peninsula issue of the Chinese government, and his party visited the DPRK from August 16 to 18.
					 During their stay, they paid a courtesy call on Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, and had talks with officials concerned.
					
					 At conversations and talks the two sides had in-depth discussions on the regional situation and the bilateral relations of friendship and matters of mutual concern including the resumption of the six-party talks and the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They reached a full consensus of views on all the matters discussed.

articles.title: South Korean Boat Intercepted
articles.content:
South Korean Boat Intercepted
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A south Korean fishing boat was intercepted by navy men of the Korean People's Army on their routine maritime guard duty at around 10:15 on August 8 when it was engaged in a fishing operation in the economic waters of the East Sea of the DPRK.
					 According to a preliminary investigation, there were four south Koreans and three Chinese on board and in their testimonies they confessed that they intruded into the economic waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The investigation is now going on.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Rev. Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion of south Korea, in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 On hand were An Kyong Ho, chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and Kang Yong Sop, chairman of the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New German Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New German Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with new German Ambassador to the DPRK Gerhard Thiedemann who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Thursday to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the opening of the diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 On hand were Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission who is chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Mun Jae Chol, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and working people in the city. 
					
					Kim Yong Jin said in his speech that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz are developing on good terms under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Comrades Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 Recalling that over the past 50 years the two peoples have fully supported and closely cooperated with each other while struggling for victory of the socialist cause, he stressed that the Korean people would make all every possible effort to strengthen the militant friendship and cohesion with the Cuban people in the future, too. 
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano said that the relations between Cuba and the DPRK are the militant friendly relations forged in the common struggle to defend the independence and sovereignty of each country and socialism. 
					
					 He sincerely hoped that the Korean people would attain the objectives set by them and that there would be fresh successes in the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Indian Embassy Officials
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Indian Embassy Officials
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with staff members of the Indian embassy here took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the independence of India.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Pratap Singh and staff members of the Indian embassy.
					
					 On hand were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-India Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the palace has greatly contributed to the education of the rising generation, the participants looked round several rooms for hobby groups.
					
					 They appreciated a performance given by members of the art group of the palace and talked to each other about further development of the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Kim Il Sung University
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the e-library and the indoor swimming pool at Kim Il Sung University on Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The members of the corps went round reading halls, computer education room, academic exchange room, remote controlled-lecture room and combined lecture room, etc. at the modern library.
					
					 Then they visited the modern indoor swimming pool on the campus of the university.
					
					 Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, wrote in the visitor's book that he sincerely hoped that the university would train many more talented persons who would plant feet on the soil of the country and look on the world, remaining intensely loyal to the party and leader and having ardent love for the country and people.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of ardent patriot Kim Po Hyon in Mangyongdae on Thursday on the occasion of his 139th birth anniversary.
					 Seen there was a wreath from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, ministries and national institutions, military universities, educational and media institutions and party and power organs and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Po Hyon, looking back on his noble life.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the immortal Songun revolutionary leadership feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of party and administrative bodies and working people's organizations and officials in the fields of science and education, those of party cadre-training institutions, media, literary and art institutions and those in the field of preservation of revolutionary and historic sites. 
					
					 Presented at the seminar were five papers explaining and proving the leadership exploits to be specially recorded in the history of strengthening and developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche Kim Jong Il has performed up to this date since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division.
					
					 Speakers said that his start of Songun revolutionary leadership marked a historical event of epochal significance in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il regarded the People's Army as a main force of revolution taking the lead in upholding the idea and leadership of the party and saw to it that ceaseless miracles and innovations were brought about in all fields of revolution and construction through the increased role of the army. In this course he provided a sure guarantee for accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause, they added. 
					
					 They stressed that the Songun politics of the WPK is the great politics attaching importance to idea as it encourages the entire army and all the people to bring about heydays of national prosperity and a great political mode as it caused great miracles and innovations to take place in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 They called for energetically opening the gate to a thriving nation, regarding his Songun revolutionary leadership exploits as the lifeline of the party.

articles.title: National Festival of Medical Science and Technology Held
articles.content:
National Festival of Medical Science and Technology Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A national festival of medical science and technology took place in Pyongyang from August 17 to 19 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 40th anniversary of the Medical Association of Korea. 
					 The festival was divided into hygiene and anti-epidemics, basic medical science, internal medicine, surgery, Koryo medicine and pharmacology panels.
					
					 Presented at the festival were at least 400 valuable papers on the successes made by researchers, teachers, doctors and pharmacists in the field of healthcare across the country in their scientific researches and practice. 
					
					 Participants in the panel discussions introduced scientific and technological achievements helpful to implementing the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of attaching importance to science and technology and its policy of preventive medicine and improving the preventive service and treatment for working people while swapping their experience. 
					
					 A closing ceremony of the festival was held at the Grand People's Study House on Thursday.

articles.title: Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Fine Art Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of fine art works on the theme of the anti-Japanese struggle was opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Center on Thursday.
					 Displayed there are at least 60 fine art works, including those produced in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and those created by artists in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Korean paintings "Return Blood for Blood and Oppose Arms with Arms" and "Arirang on Jiansanfeng" impressively depict the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung who achieved the historic cause of national liberation and the shining feats of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu who left giant traces in the history of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					Oil painting "You Should Conduct Combat Training under the Simulated Condition of Real Battle" deals with the commanding trait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has strengthened the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Korean paintings "Appeal to Koreans", "Let Us Smash Japanese Imperialists by Concerted Efforts of the Korean Nation" and "Long Live the Victory in Anti-Japanese War!" and other fine art works produced during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle show the Korean people who waged the valiant all-people resistance against Japanese imperialism.
					
					 Among the works on display are Korean painting "Grievance on the Shore of Lake Pujon", oil painting "Echo in Ulsa Year (1905)", woodcut "Sea of Blood in Northern Jiandao" and poster "Brigandish Japanese Imperialists Who Forced Koreans to Change Their Names to Japanese Ones!", which expose the hair-raising atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Posters "Soldiers of the General Are Always Ready!" and "Just Give Us Your Order!" and other works well represent the immutable faith and will of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to defend the socialist homeland of Juche as firm as a rock true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and make the enemy pay for the blood shed by the Korean people in the past a thousand fold.
					
					  Officials concerned, artists and working people in the city went round the fine art works on display.

articles.title: National Students Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
National Students Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- A national students sports contest for September 5 Prize was closed with due ceremony at the Hamhung Stadium on Thursday.
					 The participants competed in eight events including defence sports and soccer. 
					
					 Players of Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies, Haeju University of Light Industry and Pyongyang Hydrometeorological College came first in defence sports events and those of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in soccer games.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University also took the first place in men and women's basketball games, men's volleyball games and men and women's table tennis games and men's track and field events and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in women's volleyball matches, men and women's badminton matches and women's track and field events and Korean wrestling events.

articles.title: Anti-cancer Vaccine Developed
articles.content:
Anti-cancer Vaccine Developed
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- An efficacious vaccine to prevent relapse and metastasis of cancer has been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 Its developer Ri Il Hun, a section chief of the Tumor Institute under the Academy of Medical Science, told KCNA that it had been developed to prevent liver, lung, stomach and other cancers from relapse and metastasis after operation.
					
					 According to nearly ten years of animal experiments, its cancer growth suppression rate is as high as 68.8 percent, he said.
					
					 The clinical examinations of some 600 patients operated for liver, lung and stomach cancers show that the efficacy of the vaccine is 54, 32.8 and 20.3 percent higher than other medicines in the five-year survival rate, he added.
					
					 Ri Yong Il, a 48-year-old man who took the vaccine more than eight years ago after operation for hepatocellular carcinoma (10x9cm), is still in existence.
					
					 Ri Ton Sop, a 66-year-old man who took the vaccine nine years ago after undergoing an operation for lung cancer, is still alive without any relapse or metastasis.

articles.title: Korean People Merciless to Enemy
articles.content:
Korean People Merciless to Enemy
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean people do not want a war but are always merciless to those who try to hurt their dignity. 
					 In the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), the Korean army and people defeated the United States, which unleashed a war against the newly founded DPRK, and the allied forces involving its satellite countries and defended the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 After the ceasefire, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets have continued provocations against the DPRK in violation of the Armistice Agreement only to meet decisive counterattacks.
					
					 PCE No. 56 was sunk, armed spy ship Pueblo captured and large reconnaissance plane EC-121 shot down when the U.S. vessels and aircraft entered the DPRK's territorial waters and air. 
					
					 When the U.S. imperialists made a premeditated provocation at Panmunjom, the Korean army gave a heavy blow to the provokers.
					
					 In the 1990s, when a latest-type helicopter of the U.S. army intruded into the DPRK's territorial air, a Korean soldier brought it down with a single shot, and when U.S. troops opened gunfire in the demilitarized zone along the Military Demarcation Line, the Korean army launched a retaliatory strike soon.
					
					 In the new century the DPRK withdrew from the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty after the United States killed the DPRK-US framework agreement and tried to put international pressure on the DPRK by mobilizing even the International Atomic Energy Agency.
					
					 With the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets hell-bent on anti-DPRK nuclear war exercises, aggravating the already acute situation on the Korean peninsula, the DPRK has built up a nuclear deterrent to cope with them.
					
					 The historical facts clearly show that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets are doomed to failure in their anti-DPRK provocations.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats in Founding Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats in Founding Air Force
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The air force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) has grown to be invincible revolutionary armed force under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, defending the country and the gains of the revolution with credit.
					 Conspicuous in the history of the development of the Juche-oriented air force are undying feats of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He, who matured his plan to found the air force in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, put forward a policy to accomplish the cause by the Korean people themselves after the liberation of the country and wisely guided the effort for its implementation. 
					
					 He had an aviation class included in Pyongyang Institute and sent some members of the Aviation Association and young people of worker or peasant origin to the institute to study at the class.
					
					 With them as the backbone he organized a regular flying corps on August 20, Juche 36 (1947) to declare the founding of the air force, the first of its kind in the country.
					
					 He then inspected several air units for the development of the air force.
					
					 The Korean pilots fully demonstrated their combat capability in the Korean war (June 1950-July 1953) started by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 They shot down a U.S. strategic bomber B-29, called a "flying fortress", dived into the enemy's ships with burning fuselages and frustrated their "air supremacy" with the Juche-oriented war tactics. 
					
					 At the end of the 1960s, the air force of the KPA smashed U.S. large spy plane "EC-121" into smithereens in the air to demonstrate its power again.
					
					 The air force has further strengthened to meet the demand of modern warfare under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He, deeply aware of the important role of the air force in the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces, has made inspections of air units to prepare them for any provocation of the enemy.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's "Commemoration Address" Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's "Commemoration Address" Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak's "commemoration address" was malignant anti-reunification and confrontation outbursts and extremely treacherous invectives peppered with self-glorification and excuses and rhetoric intended to hoodwink people and incite confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 The commentary goes on: 
					
					 The traitor not only attacked the DPRK, again describing the warship case as "provocation" and the like but dared admonish it, talking about "changes." This was an intolerable provocation and challenge to the DPRK. 
					
					 What is resentful is that he let loose such unpardonable vituperation as a "unification tax", sheer nonsense, not content with such anti-reunification rhetoric as "peaceful community", "economic community" and "national community", a "proposal for three-phase unification" presupposing the "north's dismantlement of nuclear weapons." This is an indication of his criminal ambition for "unification of systems", pursuant to watchwords of "no-nukes, opening and 3000 dollars."
					
					 It is quite preposterous for the traitor to cry out for "peaceful community" while staging DPRK-targeted war maneuvers almost every day in league with the U.S. to do harm to fellow countrymen, to trumpet about "economic community" after totally scuttling the north-south cooperation and to call for "national community" after totally negating the inter-Korean declarations and seeking confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The traitor's rhetoric about "unification tax" reveals his foolish ambition to achieve German-style "unification of systems" in case of "contingency in the north", in utter disregard of the unanimous desire of all the Koreans for independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The "unification tax" spelled out by the traitor is, in essence, a confrontation tax and a war tax to spend the money collected from people as expenses for escalating confrontation with fellow countryman and preparing a war in a bid to realize his ambition for "unification of systems."
					
					 The Lee group of traitors will be forced to pay a dear price for spelling out the "unification tax", a mockery of the Koreans' desire for reunification.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Revival of Militarism Flailed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Revival of Militarism Flailed 
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- The Women's Peace Action against Japanese Militarism and War on the Occasion of the Centenary of the Fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" in south Korea made up of the Women's Solidarity and other women's organizations held a rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on August 15.
					 Speeches were made by Ri Kang Sil, permanent representative of the Women's Solidarity, Kang Ju Hye, secretary general of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps, and others at the rally.
					
					 Japan has not yet settled the crimes it committed during the colonial rule over Korea even though 65 years have passed since Korea's liberation, they deplored.
					
					 They accused the Japanese government of concealing its past crimes in collusion with the south Korean authorities and escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula by pursuing a hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the Japanese government is strengthening the military tie-up with the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, they urged Japan to bear in mind that the triangular military alliance would only precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 They urged the Japanese government to immediately redeem the past crimes and halt the moves to revive militarism.
					
					 The organization in a resolution recalled that resolutions calling for the settlement of the issue of "comfort women" were being adopted in city and county "assemblies" across south Korea and people from all walks of life were staging a 500,000-people signature campaign demanding the Japanese government legally settle the issue. 
					
					 It called on the people to certainly hold in check Japan's moves to revive militarism and warlike forces' attempt to launch a war.

articles.title: National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- More than 2,000 members of pro-reunification movement organizations, citizens, youth and students of south Korea held an August 15 cultural event for reunification in Seoul on August 15.
					 Speakers said that desire for peace and reunification is growing strong among people of different social standings on the occasion of August 15.
					
					 Vehemently denouncing the Lee Myung Bak "government" for bringing the south-north relations to a collapse by pursuing the policy of escalating confrontation with the DPRK, they demanded the authorities opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They called upon all the people to stage actions to bring about a new reunified country for the people in unity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Meanwhile, a rally of workers for peace and reunification was held in Seoul on the same day with members of the Confederation of Trade Unions and regional trade unions under the confederation, the Vanguard for Reunification of Workers and the Democratic Labor Party attending.
					
					 Speakers called on the people to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and achieve the peaceful reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans by thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification also released a statement on the same day calling for driving the outsiders out of south Korea and achieving the reunification of the country as early as possible.

articles.title: Declared to Have S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Legalized
articles.content:
Declared to Have S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Legalized
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Rin, honorary chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), Kwon Rak Gi, co-representative of the Reunification Meeting, O Jong Ryol, permanent adviser of the Solidarity for Progress, and other pro-reunification activists and members of civic and public organizations in south Korea formed a committee for promoting the celebration of the 20th anniversary of Pomminryon in Seoul on August 14.
					 At the inaugural ceremony speakers said that Pomminryon has waged a dynamic struggle for peaceful reunification despite hardships and trials for the last two decades since its formation.
					
					 Independent and peaceful reunification is the unanimous desire of the nation, they said, calling upon the people from all walks of life supporting the June 15 joint declaration and Pomminryon to stage actions to open the gate of reunification by pooling their energies and wisdom.
					
					 They declared that they would hold multifarious functions, issue a white paper and organize a seminar, etc. on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 A declaration read out at the ceremony stated that they would foil the Lee Myung Bak regime's fascist suppression by the concerted efforts of the democratic forces and get the "National Security Law" repealed and the South Headquarters of Pomminryon legalized.
					
					 It also stressed that they would wage a vigorous struggle to firmly preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and achieve the national reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: War Moves of US and S. Korean Puppet Forces under Fire
articles.content:
War Moves of US and S. Korean Puppet Forces under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- British organizations released statements in protest against the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in its statement on Aug. 8 branded the war exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean fascist puppet warmongers as an intolerable provocation and insult to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have become all the more undisguised in the moves to stifle the DPRK, which have reached the danger line, the statement said, calling upon all the friends of Korea and the progressives to render positive support to the DPRK standing on the outpost line of the anti-imperialist struggle and being targeted by guns and nuclear weapons of the U.S. imperialists everyday. 
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint statement on Aug. 13 noted that the Ulji Freedom Guardian war exercises are pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the extreme phase and posing grave threat to the peace in Asia and the rest of the world as they are an extension of the recent military naval exercises conducted by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 UFG has nothing to do with peace and through it the U.S. imperialists seek to establish the system of the colonial rule in the whole Korean Peninsula and secure their supremacy over the Asia-Pacific region, the statement said.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar and Finland issued statements on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, in his statement on Aug. 12 spoke highly of President Kim Il Sung who set forth the unique line on the armed struggle and tasks and ways for its realization and founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army based on them. He achieved the historic cause of the liberation of Korea by overcoming the manifold difficulties with his Juche-oriented revolutionary idea and line, unique strategy and tactics and preeminent commanding art, the statement added, stressing:
					
					 The liberation of Korea was the most precious exploit performed by Kim Il Sung, peerless patriot and hero of the nation, in the history of the Korean nation's protracted revolutionary struggle for independence. 
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, in his statement on Aug. 8 said that the Korean people could enjoy an independent life since Kim Il Sung liberated the country by organizing and leading the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialist gangsters, taking the destiny of the nation upon himself.
					
					 The statement stressed that the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who saved the Korean nation from the fate of a colonial slave and set a wonderful model of the struggle for national liberation will remain long in the world history of the struggle for national liberation along with the history of modern Korea.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, released a statement on Aug. 12 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il formulated as the three charters for national reunification the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by President Kim Il Sung and comprehensively indicated the fundamental principle for national reunification and ways for its implementation.
					
					 The Korean people have made strenuous efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the nation on the basis of the three charters, it said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces fabricated the case of sunken warship "Cheonan" in collusion with the U.S. and linked it with the DPRK and are staging large-scale war exercises for aggression, bringing dark clouds of a war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces against the reunification of Korea and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised 
Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, friendly meetings, lectures and photo exhibitions took place in Syria, Nigeria and Guinea on Aug. 10 and 11 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos showing the undying Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary of the Dara Provincial Committee of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party at the round-table talks said that thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has won victory by frustrating the moves to stifle it on the part of the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower" and its followers. 
					
					 The firm stand and indefatigable will of the Korean people under the leadership of Kim Jong Il serve as a good example that we all should follow, he added.
					
					 The national financial secretary of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria said at a friendly meeting: We are well aware of the Songun politics and hope that the Korean people would win victory in the drive to build a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said in a lecture that the Songun politics has been successfully enforced in the DPRK, fully displaying its might. This is because it is a perfect political mode under socialism and is supported by all the Korean people, he said, adding:
					
					 The absolute support of the Korean people for the Songun politics is based on their deep trust in Kim Jong Il who established this political mode. The Songun politics is the all-powerful treasured sword that has safeguarded the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the destiny of the people and brought about a turning phase in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Independence Tower Erected in Congo by Help of DPRK
articles.content:
Independence Tower Erected in Congo by Help of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 19 (KCNA) -- An independence tower was erected in Congo on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence with the assistance of the DPRK.
					 Its unveiling ceremony took place in Brazzaville on Aug. 11.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were the president of Congo, the presidents of the Upper and Lower Chambers of Congo, the governor of Brazzaville Province, personages of political and public circles and popular masses.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Congo and technicians of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The minister of Culture and Art of Congo and the mayor of Brazzaville referred to the purport and the significance of the ceremony and expressed thanks to the technicians of the DPRK who erected the tower excellent in formative artistry.
					
					 The president of Congo repeatedly expressed thanks to the DPRK ambassador and technicians, going round the tower.

articles.title: Enviado especial del gobierno chino visita Corea
articles.content:
Enviado especial del gobierno chino visita Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Wu Dawei, enviado especial del gobierno chino para el problema de la Peninsula Coreana, y su comitiva realizaron del dia 16 al 18 una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Durante su estancia, ellos hicieron la visita de cortesia a Kim Yong Il, jefe de departamento del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y al canciller Pak Ui Chun y sostuvieron conversaciones con los funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					  En las ocasiones fueron discutidos profundamente los problemas de interes comun tales como la situacion regional, las relaciones de amistad Corea-China, el reinicio de las conversaciones a 6 partes y la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Ambas partes llegaron a la completa identidad de criterios en los problemas tratados.

articles.title: Mitin por 50o aniversario de relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Cuba
articles.content:
Mitin por 50o aniversario de relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Cuba 
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el mitin conmemorativo del 50o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.
					  Fueron invitados a la ocasion el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la embajada cubana en Corea.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Jin, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Kim Hyong Jun, viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Mun Jae Chol, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, los funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  Kim Yong Jin dijo en su discurso que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el respetado Camarada Fidel Castro Ruz se desarrollan cada dia mas favorablemente bajo la profunda atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y los estimados Camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					Durante 50 anos pasados, los pueblos de ambos paises han venido apoyandose y cooperando estrechamente en la lucha por el triunfo de la causa socialista, recordo y expreso la voluntad de esforzarse en todo lo posible por fortalecer la amistad y solidaridad combativas con el pueblo cubano.
					
					El embajador cubano subrayo que las relaciones entre Cuba y Corea son las de amistad combativa establecidas en la lucha conjunta por defender la independencia y la soberania del pais y el socialismo.
					
					Deseo sinceramente que el pueblo coreano alcance todas sus metas presentadas y se logren nuevos exitos en las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Detenido barco surcoreano intruso en la zona maritima de la RPDC
articles.content:
Detenido barco surcoreano intruso en la zona maritima de la RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ATCC) -- A las diez y cuarto del pasado dia 8, un barco surcoreano, que realizaba la pesca tras invadir las aguas economicas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Este de Corea, fue detenido por las fuerzas maritimas del Ejercito Popular de Corea que cumplian su rutinaria mision de patrulla maritima.
					  Segun la investigacion elemental, la tripulacion es de 4 surcoreanos y 3 chinos que confesaron la intrusion en la zona maritima economica de la RPDC.
					
					  Ahora prosigue la investigacion del caso.

articles.title: Denuncian intento de arrestar al pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Denuncian intento de arrestar al pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol
						
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ATCC) -- El portavoz del comite norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publico el dia 18 una declaracion en relacion con que el pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol regresara el dia 20 por via de Phanmunjom.
					El pastor Han visito la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, lo cual devino la expresion de su firme voluntad de encender en el corazon de toda la nacion coreana las llamas del patriotismo por la reunificacion del 15 de junio y dar continuidad a la corriente de reunificacion independiente a costa de su sacrificio, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					La visita del pastor a la RPDC es la justa accion para mantener y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y realizar la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion y por esta razon, toda la nacion apoya activamente su decision valiente y conducta patriotica.
					
					A pesar de esto, las autoridades surcoreanas dicen que arrestarian y ejecutarian al pastor en virtud de la infame "ley de seguridad" cuando el vuelva.
					
					Para colmo, ya han emitido hasta la "orden de arresto" y recurren a la bajeza de instigar a los gangsteres conservadores ultraderechistas a insultar al pastor Han.
					
					Ademas, por conducto de la Asociacion de Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea, mandaron el aviso inhumanitario de que no pueden permitir el regreso del pastor.
					
					El comite norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio condena categoricamente traduciendo la incontenible ira nacional el intento de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de acosar de manera injusta y fascista a esa personalidad partidaria de la reunificacion calificandolo de imperdonable acto criminal que pisotea flagrantemente la devocion y la conciencia de un religioso, que quiere promover la reconciliacion y la paz de la nacion, y su libertad y derecho a las actividades por la reunificacion.
					
					El intento de la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak de encadenar hasta a la personalidad pro-reunificacion por haber visitado la RPDC es la imperdonable locura antinacional para acabar con el patriotismo mediante las acciones vendepatrias.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar ahora mismo su injusta represion contra el pastor Han Sang Ryol y afrontaran la fuerte protesta y condena de los nacionales y extranjeros si se atreven a arrestarlo.

articles.title: Construida en el Congo la torre de independencia por Corea
articles.content:
Construida en el Congo la torre de independencia por Corea
						
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario de la independencia del Congo, tuvo lugar el dia 11 en Brazzaville la ceremonia de descubrimiento de la torre de independencia, construida por la cooperacion de Corea.
					  .En el acto estuvieron presentes el presidente del Congo, los presidentes de las camaras alta y baja, el gobernador provincial de Brazzaville, las personalidades de los circulos politico y social y otros habitantes.
					
					  Fueron invitados el embajador coreano acreditado en este pais y los tecnicos coreanos.
					
					  En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					  El ministro de Cultura y Arte y el alcalde de Brazzaville se refirieron al proposito y la significacion de la construccion de dicha torre y expresaron agradecimiento a los tecnicos coreanos quienes edificaron de manera plastica y artistica la torre tan magnifica.
					
					  Recorriendo la torre, el presidente agradecio repetidamente al embajador y los tecnicos coreanos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena palabras antinacionales de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena palabras antinacionales de Lee Myung Bak
						
Pyongyang, 19 de agosto (ATCC) -- El llamado "discurso conmemorativo" pronunciado hace poco por el traidor Lee Myung Bak resulta el disparate antinacional y anti-reunificacion penetrado de punta a cabo de egolatria, excusa, engano al pueblo y chismes en busca de confrontacion fratricida.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 19 y continua:
					
					  Al volver a cuestionar el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra surcoreano, el lo califico de "provocacion" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y se atrevio a dar instrucciones hablando del supuesto "cambio".
					
					  Esto deviene intolerable provocacion y desafio a la RPDC.
					
					  Lo que causa mas indignacion es que el presento el "proyecto de reunificacion por tres etapas" de caracter anti-reunificacion, o sea, a traves de la "comunidad en paz", la "comunidad economica" y la "comunidad nacional", planteando como premisa la "renuncia nuclear de la RPDC". Para colmo, propuso absurdamente instituir el "impuesto de la reunificacion".
					
					  Esto deviene la muestra de su criminal ambicion de la "reunificacion de regimenes" segun el proyecto de la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 mil dolares".
					
					  Resulta muy ilogico hablar la "comunidad en paz" librando casi todos los dias con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra contra la connacional RPDC, abogar por la "comunidad economica" sofocando todos los proyectos de cooperacion N-S y demandar la "comunidad nacional" negando las declaraciones Norte-Sur e impidiendo la reunificacion.
					
					  El traidor Lee planteo esta vez el "impuesto de la reunificacion" en su siniestro intento de alcanzar la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" como el caso de Alemania suponiendo la "situacion de emergencia del Norte", sin hacer caso del deseo unanime de todos los coreanos sobre la reunificacion independiente y pacifica.
					
					  El "impuesto de la reunificacion" deviene el tributo de enfrentamiento y guerra para malgastar los impuestos recaudados a los habitantes surcoreanos en la campana de confrontacion fratricida, la preparacion de la guerra y la realizacion de la ambicion de la "reunificacion de regimenes".
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak pagara caro su disparate de ese impuesto burlandose de la nacion coreana deseosa de reunificar el pais.
